attributes.action: Bring back the national service and sign up all under 21 year olds to do at least one years service, also use the armed forces as a life changing experience to young effenders, this will hopefully assist in bringing back RESPECT and putting the GREAT back into great Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with seveal already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Englishman/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
